modName: Majestic Mirage - RaceMenu Preset and UUNP BodySlide - DELETED
summary: Majestic Mirage is a RaceMenu preset that comes with her own UUNP BodySlide.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][b][img]https://i.imgur.com/XO1qBDo.jpg[/img]﻿
[/b]Majestic Mirage uses the [b]2k/4k Scar Textures and Wet Body Textures[/b], [i]instead of 2k/4k No Scar Textures
and Smooth Body Textures[/i] from SG.
[b]

[color=#9fc5e8]- Download Mirage Installers -[/color][/b]
• Majestic Mirage RaceMenu Preset
• Mirage Sleek Bodyslide (UUNP)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#9fc5e8][b]- Mods Required For Preset Compatibility -[/b][/color]
• [Install]: DIMONIZED UNP female body﻿ (or variant).


• [Install]: Fair Skin Complexion (UNP)
[color=#9fc5e8][i]* I use Optimized, but the other UNP one should be fine.
* Use all assets that come with the main file: body textures, brows, eyes, etc.[/i][/color]


• [Install]: SG Female Textures Renewal (UNP) (Main File)
SG Textures UNP Options
[color=#9fc5e8][i]* A.) UNP Textures (Main File)
B.) 2K/4k Scar Textures (UNP Options)
C.) Wet Body Textures [i](UNP Options)[/i][/i]
[/color]

• [Install]: KS Hairdos Renewal
• [Install]: The Eyes Of Beauty
• [Install]: Brows
• [Install]: Ravens Warpaint (Standalone 11-13)
• [Install]: The Coenaculi


• [Install]: Freckle Mania
[color=#b6d7a8][i][color=#9fc5e8]* First version. Could probably use version two.[/color]
[/i][/color]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

• Set up Mirage Sleek in BodySlide, if you want to use it.
[color=#9fc5e8][i]* I do recommend it, as I made it to go with her RaceMenu preset
and for her values, her weight is set to 0.11 and height is 8.2.[/i]
[/color]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#9fc5e8][b]- In-Game -[/b][/color]
• Set your character's race to Breton.
• Load up the Majestic Mirage RaceMenu preset.



﻿
[img]https://i.imgur.com/oG4K8xL.jpg[/img]﻿

• Permission is given to use my Majestic Mirage RaceMenu preset and Mirage Sleek BodySlide for your personal appearance only, well as any screenshots taken of Mirage by me, posted on this page.

• Do NOT create a follower mod of Majestic Mirage and upload it to the NexusMods or a third party website. I will do it myself (if time and interest allow), contacting the correct audience to gain permission from creators to use their assets.

• If you would like to use the Mirage Sleek BodySlide for a follower of yours, then all I ask is to credit me on your follower's page and link them here to download the whatever BodySlide.

• Uploading the Majestic Mirage RaceMenu preset and Mirage Sleek BodySlide to other avenues is prohibited, well as trying to make any sort of income from it. The Majestic Mirage RaceMenu preset and Mirage Sleek BodySlide will only exist on NexusMods, Forever Free, as it should be.

• Any imagery with text on it (e.g. banners), shown in the header and on this description page, aren't to be used for your own work — its for this mod page only.[/center]
author: Ava Mods
